Articles.Content:
> 
> Oh boy...they're really doing this aren't they? <breaks out="" the="" rosary=""></breaks>

Yep, they are. I'm digging a bomb shelter, personally. Kinda rough going as it's in a neighbor's backyard and they're armed with shotguns full of rock salt....

> 
> Yep, they are. I'm digging a bomb shelter, personally. Kinda rough going as it's in a neighbor's backyard and they're armed with shotguns full of rock salt....

While you're hanging out with your shotgun, perhaps you'd like to practice for a bit on some zombies? Hmmm? Maybe? ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
If we post our pics here, will we be eligible for the prize? Or is that only for twitter? Probably just for twits.

> 
> Just a guess, but wouldn't it be more fitting for a game like KSP to start its countdown at 10?

Kerbal math is base 11. Which is why so many things explode when designed by humans.

> 
> If we post our pics here, will we be eligible for the prize? Or is that only for twitter? Probably just for twits.

Can you #HASHTAG the forums? No?
gg Squad, gg.

> 
> While you're hanging out with your shotgun, perhaps you'd like to practice for a bit on some zombies? Hmmm? Maybe? ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

It's the neighbor who has the shotgun heh. Those rock salt pellets sting!

I've pretty much milked vanilla A11 dry, so a BTGB playthrough is coming up shortly ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> If we post our pics here, will we be eligible for the prize? Or is that only for twitter? Probably just for twits.

Prize? What's this about a prize?

> 
> If we post our pics here, will we be eligible for the prize? Or is that only for twitter? Probably just for twits.

You could always try Reddit.
11 6hour kerbin days till release?
And here I thought we would get a 0.625m SRB, not an oversized sepratron. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

> 
> You could always try Reddit.

Just looked at the KSP subreddit, looks like they don't get to participate either.

How am I going to win big with out a twitter account?!?

![3EaO7OC.png](http://i.imgur.com/3EaO7OC.png)
Please don't add K to countdown. It's childish and stupid.

> 
> Please don't add K to countdown. It's childish and stupid.

and harmless.

> 
> and harmless.

*And* it offends the sensibilities of serious players.

> 
> I for one am done with Maxmaps. I will never again watch another Squadcast with him at the helm. I don't understand why he's allowed to broadcast the little "clues and mysteries" on anything that isn't the KSP Forum. I realize that you mods will probably sanction me for this post, but do what you will. I'm done... SpacedCowboy.

I agree with you actually on them not using the forums for announcing stuff, and why would the mods sanction you?

Still going to watch the squadcast though because of 1.0 info and stuff.

I hope it's 11 days, so that I can defend my Thesis BEFORE this beautify causes magnificent desolation on my ability to concentrate for a week. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

> 
> *And* it offends the sensibilities of serious players.

And this is a bad thing? If we jump down throat of everyone who adds the letter K to words we risk hurting the sensibilities of a genuine child. That sounds much worse!

Serious players are made of tougher stuff they can stand having their sensibilities roughed up a bit in the name of entertaining the children ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) cause what is cuter than a kid playing kerbal?

> 
> If the countdown begins tomorrow it'll release April 28th... which is a Tuesday, which is historically when they do releases! ![:o](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_ohmy.png)

Holy Kraken.

> 
> And this is a bad thing? If we jump down throat of everyone who adds the letter K to words we risk hurting the sensibilities of a genuine child. That sounds much worse!
> Serious players are made of tougher stuff they can stand having their sensibilities roughed up a bit in the name of entertaining the children ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) cause what is cuter than a kid playing kerbal?

In the interest of preventing a flame war, fine.

I'm vaguely interested to see what happens on launch. Will KSP end up on Origin? What business deals come to fruition? Will the reason for the rush to 1.0 become apparent? 

All these questions and more will be answered! Stay tuned!

> 
> And this is a bad thing? If we jump down throat of everyone who adds the letter K to words we risk hurting the sensibilities of a genuine child. That sounds much worse!
> Serious players are made of tougher stuff they can stand having their sensibilities roughed up a bit in the name of entertaining the children ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) cause what is cuter than a kid playing kerbal?

I believe you mean "ein Kind". (see what I did there?)

I don't mind it. Kommunity is fine, but Kerbamerica isn't to me.

Huh.... 11 somethings till something...

> 
> Will KSP end up on Origin?

KSP will not go to origin. Ever. They know better. Because if it \*did\*, I would open one of my six mouths, and I would sing the song that would end the Earth.

[https://twitter.com/KerbalSpaceP](https://twitter.com/KerbalSpaceP)Honestly I looked at this and though hey why cant we get in on these 2. I had a google and forum search and found next to nothing. If there is 1 already then post a link please.

Seems sad but Squad are less and less involved with the kermunity and sliding down with the twit crowd, even reddits are getting more attention then we are

If there are any others out there that people find please let us all know ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

There isn't a thread for it per-se, but theres a bit of discussion on it in the countdown thread.

It seems like it's a twitter submission only thing, even Reddit isn't eligible.
